title: 2017 Ford F350 Flatbed Dually With (2) Hexagon 950 Bar Hydrogen 2-Tank Modules For Transport and Mobile Refueling Applications
item_description:
2017 Ford F350 Flatbed Dually With (2) Hexagon 950 Bar Hydrogen 2-Tank Modules For Transport and Mobile Refueling Applications

Specifications

  • Year: 2017
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F350 SD
  • VIN: 1FDRF3G67HED53007
  • License: ZEROEI1
    • Registration Expiration: 1/31/2026
    • Personalized Plate - seller may keep
  • Odometer Reads: 41,161 
    • Odometer now reads after smog: 41,166 (updated during preview 10/6/2025)
  • Key: Available
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: 6.2L V8 OHV 16V
  • Body Style: Flatbed Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT245/75R17
  • Deck Length: 160”
  • Deck Width: 95”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Features:
    • Bluetooth Hands-Free
    • Cruise Control
    • Multi-Zone Climate Control
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Security System
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Air Conditioning
    • Dual Rear Wheels

Hydrogen Capacity: 50kg at 950 bar

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Smog Certificate will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the transfer of title, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
